title: The holocaus Dachau & Sachsenhausen
description:
The holocaust
Dachau & Sachsenhausen
A record of the nazi atrocities
1933-1945


Whilst Hitler sought the answer to his \\\\\\\"Jewish problem\\\\\\\" more and more centres of containment sptung up throughout Nazi occupied Europe. Two such camps were Dachau and Sachsenhausen, and although perhaps not such recognisable name as Auschwitz, they were no less crucial in the persecution and extermination of the European Jews.
